key_findings.gate1: All quality checks passed. HMM unsupervised model with 30 Optuna trials. No leak indicators (max autocorr=0.926).
key_findings.gate2: MI increase only 0.68% (threshold 5%). Submodel per-column MI = 0.0 via sklearn. VIF inf from base features (submodel VIFs < 2.1). Stability PASS at 0.148.
key_findings.gate3: DA +0.96% (PASS), Sharpe +0.289 (PASS), MAE +0.016 (FAIL). Consistent improvement in 4/5 folds for both DA and Sharpe.
